A FOB (Forward Operating Base) is typically defined as a military base located in a combat zone.
FOB stands for Forward Operating Base, often set up for military operations.
FOBs are used for strategic military purposes in combat zones, acting as temporary bases of operations.

People will set up a tiny claim or personal claim right next to something they want to attack. They’ll put up simple defenses and stock weapons and Armor. JH rolls around and they use that as their base, this is known as a FOB (Forward operating base)
